channel.title: WSTG-V42-INPV-06 on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in WSTG-V42-INPV-06 on ZAP

item.title: LDAP Injection
item.description: LDAP Injection may be possible. It may be possible for an attacker to bypass authentication controls, and to view and modify arbitrary data in the LDAP directory.
